ing: 2 (64 fluid ounce) bottles raspberry cream soda, chilled
1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen concentrated raspberry juice
des: "A delicious raspberry punch that goes great with chocolate. Use either vanilla ice cream or raspberry sherbet."
ins: In large punch bowl combine both bottles of raspberry cream soda and raspberry juice concentrate. Stir until concentrate is dissolved.  Carefully add ice cream. Stir briefly. Best served chilled.
